1.name: Scratch
1.description: Charmander attacks with sharp claws, dealing light damage.

2.name: Ember
2.description: Charmander sends out small flames, damaging the opponent. Deals moderate damage and destroys 8 random tiles.

3.name: Rock Smash
3.description: The user attacks with a punch that can shatter a rock. Destroys a 3x3 block of tiles.

4.name: Quick Attack
4.description: Pikachu zips across the battlefield dealing damage and destroying 4 random tiles.

5.name: Iron Tail
5.description: Pikachu's tail hardens and smashes against the opponent, dealing damage and destroying a random 3x3 block of tiles.

6.name: Thunder Bolt
6.description: Pikachu summons a lighning bolt to strike the opponent. Deals massive damage to the target and destroys a random column.

7.name: Bite
7.description: Squirtle bites the foe, dealing damage and destroying 2 random tiles.

8.name: Skull Bash
8.description: Squirtle tucks its head into its shell and then bashes the foe, dealing massive damage and destroying a 5x5 block of tiles.

9.name: Water Gun
9.description: Shoots a strong stream of water at the foe, dealing moderate damage and destroying a random row.

10.name: Growth
10.description: Transforms 6 random tiles into grass tiles

11.name: Razor Leaf
11.description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing Pok√©mon. Deals additional damage based on number of grass tiles in play.

12.name: Poison Powder
12.description: Scatters a toxic powder that poisons the foe. For the next 3 turns, the opponent takes extra damage.

13.name: Confusion
13.description: The foe is hit by a weak telekinetic force.

14.name: Gust
14.description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the foe to inflict damage.

15.name: Whirlwind
15.description: Strong winds blow away all tiles on the battlefield, causing entire board to be shuffled.

16.name: Bug Buzz
16.description: The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave.

17.name: Earthquake
17.description: The user causes the ground to quake, dealing damage and shuffling the board.

18.name: Rock Throw
18.description: The user throws a large rock at the foe, dealing damage and destroying a 5x5 block of tiles.

19.name: Slash
19.description: The user slashes the foe viciously, dealing damage.

20.name: Flame Burst
20.description: The user shoots fire at the foe, exploding upon contact. Deals damage and destroys a 3x3 block of tiles.

21.name: Rock Tomb
21.description: The user sends out a large pile of rocks, dealing damage and slowing the foe.

22.name: Dragon Claw
22.description: The user sends out a large pile of rocks, dealing damage and destroying 3 random columns.

23.name: Air Cutter
23.description: The user cuts the air with its wings. Deals damage and destroys 3 random rows

24.name: Fire Blast
24.description: The user blasts the foe with a scorching inferno, dealing massive damage and destroying 15 random tiles.
